column2: Wave Life Sciences Ltd. is a biotechnology company, which engages in the development of proprietary synthetic chemistry drug. The company employs 250 full-time employees The Company, through its synthetic chemistry drug development platform, designs, develops and commercializes a pipeline of nucleic acid therapeutic candidates for genetically defined diseases. The firm is engaged in developing oligonucleotides that target genetic defects to either reduce the expression of disease-promoting proteins or transform the production of dysfunctional mutant proteins into the production of functional proteins. The nucleic acid therapeutics, which the Company is developing are stereopure. A stereopure oligonucleotide includes molecules with atoms arranged in three-dimensional orientations at each linkage. The firm has three programs in Huntington's disease (HD) and Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy (DMD), and three additional development candidates.
7 Straits View, #12-00, Marina One East Tower
